rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C112455

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire VFQ25-Self Administered Format Test Code Terminology

definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format test code.
name: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire VFQ25-Self Administered Format Test Code Terminology
synonyms: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - General Health and Vision: In general, would you say your overall health is:
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Overall Health

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - General Health and Vision: At the present time, would you say your eyesight using both eyes (with glasses or contact lenses, if you wear them) is excellent, good, fair, poor, or very poor or are you completely blind?
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Eyesight Using Both Eyes

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - General Health and Vision: How much of the time do you worry about your eyesight?
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Time Spent Worry About Eyesight
synonyms: VFQ2-How Often You Worry About Eyesight

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - General Health and Vision: How much pain or discomfort have you had in and around your eyes (for example, burning, itching, or aching)? Would you say it is:
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Pain or Discomfort You Had in and Around Eyes
synonyms: VFQ2-How Much Pain in and Around Eyes

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Difficulty With Activities: How much difficulty do you have reading ordinary print in newspapers? Would you say you have:
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Difficulty Reading Ordinary Print in Newspapers

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Difficulty With Activities: How much difficulty do you have doing work or hobbies that require you to see well up close, such as cooking, sewing, fixing things around the house, or using hand tools? Would you say:
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Difficulty Doing Work or Hobbies

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Difficulty With Activities: Because of your eyesight, how much difficulty do you have finding something on a crowded shelf?
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Difficulty Finding Something On a Shelf

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Difficulty With Activities: How much difficulty do you have reading street signs or the names of stores?
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Difficulty Reading Street Signs

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Difficulty With Activities: Because of your eyesight, how much difficulty do you have going down steps, stairs, or curbs in dim light or at night?
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Difficulty Going Down Steps at Night
synonyms: VFQ2-Difficulty Going Down Step at Night

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Difficulty With Activities: Because of your eyesight, how much difficulty do you have noticing objects off to the side while you are walking along?
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Difficulty Noticing Objects Off to the Side While Walking

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Difficulty With Activities: Because of your eyesight, how much difficulty do you have seeing how people react to things you say?
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Difficulty Seeing How People React

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Difficulty With Activities: Because of your eyesight, how much difficulty do you have picking out and matching your own clothes?
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Difficulty Picking Out and Matching Own Clothes

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Difficulty With Activities: Because of your eyesight, how much difficulty do you have visiting with people in their homes, at parties, or in restaurants?
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Difficulty Visiting People

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Difficulty With Activities: Because of your eyesight, how much difficulty do you have going out to see movies, plays, or sports events?
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Difficulty Going Out to See Movies
synonyms: VFQ2-Difficulty Going Out to See Movies

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Difficulty With Activities: Are you currently driving, at least once in a while?
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Are You Currently Driving

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Difficulty With Activities: If no: Have you never driven a car or have you given up driving?
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Never Driven or Given Up Driving
synonyms: VFQ2-Never Driven or Given Up Driving

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Difficulty With Activities: If you gave up driving: Was that mainly because of your eyesight, mainly for some other reason, or because of both your eyesight and other reasons?
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Main Reason You Gave Up Driving
synonyms: VFQ2-Main Reason You Gave Up Driving

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Difficulty With Activities: If currently driving: How much difficulty do you have driving during the daytime in familiar places? Would you say you have:
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Difficulty Driving During Daytime

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Difficulty With Activities: How much difficulty do you have driving at night? Would you say you have:
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Difficulty Driving at Night

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Difficulty With Activities: How much difficulty do you have driving in difficult conditions, such as in bad weather, during rush hour, on the freeway, or in city traffic? Would you say you have:
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Driving in Difficult Condition

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Responses to Vision Problems: Do you accomplish less than you would like because of your vision?
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Accomplish Less Because of Vision
synonyms: VFQ2-Accomplish Less Than You Would Like

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Responses to Vision Problems: Are you limited in how long you can work or do other activities because of your vision?
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Limited in How Long You Can Work Because of Vision
synonyms: VFQ2-Limited in How Long You Can Work

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Responses to Vision Problems: How much does pain or discomfort in or around your eyes, for example, burning, itching, or aching, keep you from doing what you'd like to be doing? Would you say:
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Pain in Eyes Keep You From Doing What You Like
synonyms: VFQ2-Eye Pain Keep From Doing What Like

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Responses to Vision Problems: I stay home most of the time because of my eyesight.
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Stay Home Because of Eyesight
synonyms: VFQ2-I Stay Home Most of the Time

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Responses to Vision Problems: I feel frustrated a lot of the time because of my eyesight.
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Feel Frustrated Because of Eyesight
synonyms: VFQ2-I Feel Frustrated a Lot of the Time

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Responses to Vision Problems: I have much less control over what I do, because of my eyesight.
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Have Less Control Because of Eyesight
synonyms: VFQ2-Much Less Control Over What I Do

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Responses to Vision Problems: Because of my eyesight, I have to rely too much on what other people tell me.
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Have to Rely On Other People Because of Eyesight
synonyms: VFQ2-Rely Too Much on What Others Tell

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Responses to Vision Problems: I need a lot of help from others because of my eyesight.
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Need Help From Others Because of Eyesight
synonyms: VFQ2-I Need a Lot of Help From Others

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Responses to Vision Problems: I worry about doing things that will embarrass myself or others, because of my eyesight.
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Worry About Embarrass Myself or Others Because of Eyesight

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - General Health: How would you rate your overall health, on a scale where zero is as bad as death and 10 is best possible health?
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Rate Your Overall Health

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - General Vision: How would you rate your eyesight now (with glasses or contact lens on, if you wear them), on a scale of from 0 to 10, where zero means the worst possible eyesight, as bad or worse than being blind, and 10 means the best possible eyesight?
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Rate Your Eyesight Now

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Near Vision: Wearing glasses, how much difficulty do you have reading the small print in a telephone book, on a medicine bottle, or on legal forms? Would you say:
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Difficulty Reading Small Print

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Near Vision: Because of your eyesight, how much difficulty do you have figuring out whether bills you receive are accurate?
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Difficulty Figure Out Bill Accuracy

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Near Vision: Because of your eyesight, how much difficulty do you have doing things like shaving, styling your hair, or putting on makeup?
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Difficulty Shaving or Styling Hair or Putting On Makeup

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Distance Vision: Because of your eyesight, how much difficulty do you have recognizing people you know from across a room?
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Difficulty Recognizing People You Know

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Distance Vision: Because of your eyesight, how much difficulty do you have taking part in active sports or other outdoor activities that you enjoy (like golf, bowling, jogging, or walking)?
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Difficulty Taking Part in Sports or Outdoor Activities

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Distance Vision: Because of your eyesight, how much difficulty do you have seeing and enjoying programs on TV?
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Difficulty Seeing and Enjoying Programs on TV

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Social Function: Because of your eyesight, how much difficulty do you have entertaining friends and family in your home?
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Difficulty Entertaining Friends and Family in Home

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Role Limitations: Do you have more help from others because of your vision?
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Do You Have More Help From Others
synonyms: VFQ2-Do You Have More Help From Others

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Role Limitations: Are you limited in the kinds of things you can do because of your vision?
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Limited in Kinds of Things Can Do
synonyms: VFQ2-Limited in Kinds of Things Can Do

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Well-Being/Distress: I am often irritable because of my eyesight.
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Often Irritable Because of Eyesight

terms.definition: National Eye Institute Visual Functioning Questionnaire - 25 Version 2000 Self-Administered Format - Dependency: I don't go out of my home alone, because of my eyesight.
terms.preferredTerm: VFQ25-Self Administered Format - Don't Go Out of Home Alone Because of Eyesight
synonyms: VFQ2-I Don't Go Out of My Home Alone
